body.name: Elite Gourmet EAF-3218R Personal 1.1 Quart Compact Space Saving Electric Hot Air Fryer Oil-Less Healthy Cooker, Timer & Temperature Controls, Red.
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: COMPACT SIZE: The Non-Stick pan and rack hold 1Qt or up to 3/4 lb of food Perfect for personal use or when cooking for a few. Cook faster and more safely than in oil, eliminating splatter burns and reducing electricity use.

HEALTHY EATING by cooking with 85% less oil for fat-free delicious meals. Same flavor and crispy finish without the added calories! Simply add food to the drawer pan, add a tbsp of oil if desired, set temp/time, and start cooking!

ADJUSTABLE TIME/TEMP gives you the ultimate in cooking control and versatility allowing you to fry, bake, grill and roast all in one! A high-power convection fan envelopes food in temperatures from 180F to 390F degrees and a 30-minute timer automatically shuts off the air fryer at the end of the cooking cycle.
GUILT-FREE FRYING lets you enjoy crispy veggie chips, fish fillets, chicken tenders and more without fatty oils. Includes delicious and healthy recipes to get you started.
COOL-TOUCH HANDLE lets you safely remove fried foods from the air fryer without burning your hands. The exterior of the Elite Gourmet Air Fryer retains its pristine condition with just a damp cloth.

ETL APPROVED 700-Watt/120V Air fryer with 1 quart capacity is ideal for home kitchen use. Dishwasher safe removable Non-Stick coated 1 quart drawer pan with removable frying rack for fast, easy clean-up

TRUSTED BRAND - As a trusted brand for 40 years, Elite Gourmet has delivered high quality and stylish kitchen products that are affordable & user friendly. Call, email, or live chat with us, our US-based support team responds quickly to all inquiries.
body.description: The Elite Gourmet Oil-Free Air Fryer has a variety of functions to handle a wide array of cooking tasks. With its easy to use Timer and Temperature control knobs, you can fry, cook, or even bake your favorite meals and snacks with ease! Not only can you cook foods without the mess of oil but you can cook faster which saves you time and energy. Unlike most conventional deep fryers, the Oil-Free Air Fryer's unique vapor system combined with circulating hot air will automatically make foods crispier and of course healthier without oil.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Two!
reviews.reviewText: This is my first air fryer and I couldn’t be more pleased! It’s a perfect size for two people. Cooks well, cute-looking and takes little counter space. I’ve enjoyed getting used to air-frying and will probably “graduate” to one just a bit bigger (maybe a microwave/air-fryer combination as my current microwave is on its last legs!). But, if and when that happens, the little one will be relocated to my RV! I love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great if you want an air fryer that's compact and not for large meals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A-dorable. Easy. Works fine. Simple.
reviews.reviewText: I read it was Teflon-free, so ceramic, which was a requirement for me in an air fryer. I was delighted to see it was so dang cute! And cheap. My only qualm as per other reviews too, is the timer is that super old-school, cheap microwave kind (think crappy microwaves at convenience stores) where you turn it to a time, say 10 mins, and you can’t decide it’s done or you want less time by turning it counter clockwise to say 5 mins. It won’t go. And you can’t turn it off with the timer dial to say 0. It won’t go. It only turns clockwise to a higher amount of time. To me that’s so annoying and inflexible. Giving us less control. What they do is force you to instead pull the tray out in order to stop it, which is awkward. Or unplug it, till the timer runs out on its own.Anyway, for how cute it is and the price, I can live with that, though I hope they fix it in any design updates.It’s perfect for my main reason for buying it: making a single homemade chocolate chip cookies! Lol.Yes, it’s my way to have it all. A tiny fresh-baked cookie in 10 mins time, anytime. I make chocolate chip cookie dough in advance, portion it into individual cookie sizes, and freeze for when I want just one. I used to do this in a toaster oven which air fryers have basically replaced. So, after a meal when I want a small treat, I pop one cookie dough ball into the fryer on a small, heat-safe dish like foil or a tart dish, set the temp pretty low since fryers are basically super-charged convection ovens, about 250°, at 10 mins (frozen dough takes longer..in a reg oven they’d take 12-13 at 350°).And bing! I have a delicious cookie! Better than regular ovens since the convection aspect makes cookie edges have that buttery crispness, yet the inside is gooey. Heaven! (Convection means a fan is pushing and swirling hot air all around your food vs it just sitting in stagnant hot air.)Helps me watch my weight, easily making only one at a time. Doesn’t heat up the kitchen (well, a little heat exhaust happens) and is more environmentally friendly.Works well for the same concept in cakes! Make cake batter. Freeze it in a square pan. Once frozen, pop it out of the pan onto a cutting board. Chop it with a large knife into 2” square pieces. Throw into your freezer till you crave it. Then, like the cookies, take a frozen cake batter square out, set it into the fryer and bake! You have a single portion piece of cake! (Though cake batter works pretty well microwaved too since microwaves do moist. Cookie dough needs dry air to bake well so only ovens).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this little air fryer! It's super easy to use and clean and it cooks food like a restaurant!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for me!
reviews.reviewText: I love this product, it’s compact, takes little counter space and very easy to use and clean. Better than a microwave, as it crisps certain leftovers, like hash browns. One dial sets the temperature and the other sets the time. Great product for smaller portions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for the office because sometimes we like to reheat our lunch. It’s the perfect small size fits right in our little area that we have and works very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s almost too powerful and the racks are cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: I previously have only used basket style airfryers but wanted to have a 2-in-1 toaster/airfryer that was compact and saved counter space for my apartment. This one was in a good price range and I liked blue color and it is a good size for a household of two. I’ve had it for a month or so now and its decent for the price. Issues I’ve had are:1. The racks don’t fit well in the oven, they fit very loosely. The rack, basket and tray are almost 1mm too small to fit into the grooves of the oven well. Sometimes they will collapse mid use due to heat expansion and the fan blowing2. This machine is “too swole” as my partner and I like to describe it. The pre-sets sometimes burn our food on the outside and don’t cook long enough to cook the inside so there’s a learning curve to play with the time and temperature. For example the pre-set for toast is 450F for 6 minutes but that will give you burnt toast. I found 300F for 4 min is better.For now, it does what I need it to so and makes crisp food. However, it is not as simple as set and go and I have to spend more time meticulously placing the trays in to make sure it stays put while it cooks and playing around the time and temperature. In the future, I would probably just invest in a better one for the convenience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I am first time air fryer person!!
reviews.reviewText: This product is easy to use and doesn’t take up much space! I’m enjoying it and have become more excited about food. I recently made potato skins and they were amazing.( I used potato peeler to make the supper thin) They came out crunchy like potato chips!

reviews.reviewTitle: Fast & easy, a very useful way to cook!
reviews.reviewText: I researched and found out the process for getting rid of the plastic smell. Once that was done, we cooked Chinese BBQ pork; the second meal, we cooked frozen chicken thighs, now we are wondering how we survived so long! This is an excellent appliance for a single or couple to avoid standing over a stove or heating an entire oven. Highly recommended! I also recommend paper liners which help! It’s really a miniature convection oven which I love.
We really love this addition to our kitchen. Using it regularly now, and very happy with it.

Excelente producto. Fácil de usar. El sabor en los alimentos es muy bueno. Lo mejor es que es sin aceite. Mi esposo está encantado. Las alitas quedas crujientes y los cortes de carne deliciosos. Las papas fritas con una sola cucharada de aceite. Quedan perfectas. Definitivamente lo compraria sin pensarlo nuevamente.
Purchased as a gift and my friend loves it and uses it all the time. Easy to use and comes apart for easy cleaning.

I got this because my husband works on the road and often is in hotels. I’ve used it on some of our own travels, and it’s great! Easy to use, seems efficient (if you ensure you flip what you’re cooking halfway), so yeah it’s been good.I don’t think the quality will last long term, but I’ve had it a couple months and I’m happy so far
